significant_findings.title: IP Whitelisting for Agent Wallets - Live
significant_findings.description: Bankr deployed IP whitelisting security feature for agent wallets. This ensures only authorized services can interact with API keys, preventing private key leaks. Critical security infrastructure for agents managing assets.
significant_findings.impact: Infrastructure advancement for safe agent wallet management on Base

ecosystem_signals.signal: Multiple RTs about agent ecosystem momentum and Virtuals funding agents up to $1M/month

ecosystem_signals.note: Jesse's major strategic shift post from Feb 12 02:19 (outside 4-hour window but highly relevant context) outlined pivot from creators back to traders/builders, emphasizing trading as Base's biggest growth opportunity

summary: One significant development: Bankr shipping IP whitelisting for agent wallets (live at 17:51 UTC). This is core infrastructure for the emerging agent financial ecosystem. Broader context shows Jesse actively signaling trader focus and agent economy momentum via RTs, consistent with his earlier Feb 12 02:19 strategic realignment post.
